title: Super Tough Script
content:
Best picture I could get! No idea what this could be.

comments.content: I can hardly read what it says, but I think it’s [Snell Roundhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/snell-roundhand-script/).
the photo -- looks like a drivers license. id'ing the font to make an id?
